links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One
The Theft of Melko and the Darkening of Valinor

wikitext.*:
'''Híri''' was a stream in [[Valinor]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.

It started to the north of the hill of [[Kôr]], and then flowed across the plain of Valinor until it plunged underground north of the roots of [[Silpion]] near [[Sirnúmen]]. It is possible that it eventually reached the [[Outer Sea]].<ref>{{LT1|VI}}, p. 142</ref>
